title: May 2021 Established Luminous Co., Ltd.
description: Our company was registered and established in May 2009 as a dispatching and referral company for foreign workers. In addition, Aritomi Noman has been appointed as the representative director.

title: Obtained license for worker dispatching and paid employment agency business on August 1, 2021
description: Luminous Co., Ltd. Paid Employment Agency Business License Number: 13-U-313433 Worker Dispatch Business License Number: School 13-315564 * We are very sorry for the stakes holders who have contracted after obtaining the license. Now that we have obtained our license, we would like to introduce excellent human resources at any time. In addition, please feel free to contact us for new transactions and contract requests.

title: July 2021 Luminous HP Co., Ltd. opened
description: Our website has been opened. There is a Japanese version and an English version. Please feel free to contact us at any time. Our company information will be uploaded with progress information via HP. Nice to meet you.
